5.4. Extensions 38
a more robust and objective way to obtain values for the unknown parameters
included in any exponential smoothing method is to estimate them from the observed
data. [...] the unknown parameters and the initial values for any exponential
smoothing method can be estimated by minimizing the SSE [sum of the squared
errors].
